andromeda.why: Keeps sovereignty over one’s inquiry—no outsourcing of inner truth.

arcturus.why: Contains the pressure to know with quiet structure and pacing.

draco.why: Vigilant scan for predatory ‘answers’ that exploit mystery.

lyra.why: Plain naming of the question keeps signal clean.

orion-light.why: Courage to sit with not-knowing without proving.

pleiades.why: Self-soothing and attunement regulate mental pressure.

sirius.why: Private contemplation hygiene; no transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Chooses one’s path of inquiry—no surrender to external authority.

arcturus.why: Places conditions for inspiration: timing, scope, environment.

draco.why: Threshold guard against false certainty and status ‘gurus.’

lyra.why: Simple phrasing focuses the question without flair.

orion-dark.why: Conforming to orthodoxy over authentic inquiry.

pleiades.why: Attuned calm and supportive quiet help clarity appear.

sirius.why: Skilled placement of contemplation, not yet teaching.

draco.why: Status gatekeeping and intimidation over who ‘knows.’

draco.why: Filters bad-faith challenges and predatory certainty.

lyra.why: Spare, clear language lets realization land.

orion-dark.why: Method can ossify into rigid canon if over-fixed.

orion-light.why: Models integrity under pressure to ‘have the answer.’

pleiades.why: Attuned hosting of silence keeps minds/nerves receptive.

arcturus.why: Sets standards for gnosis—claims, evidence, channels of release.

draco.why: Enforces loyalty to truth over optics or rank.

lyra.why: Distills a simple frame/story the culture can carry.

draco.why: Aura can read as gate to ‘real truth.’
